snippet.title: Midwintär Cinematic Intro
snippet.description:
Midwintär is a narrative-driven stealth action game inspired by medieval horror folklore that combines careful tactical planning with fast-paced arcade execution and innovative gossip mechanics. Play and switch between three protagonists - a werewolf, a vampire and a moon witch - to exact your revenge on a vicious religious cult.

Wishlist Midwintär on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724900/Midwintar/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gamechuckdev
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gamechuckretro
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gamechuckdev/
Discord: https://game-chuck.com/discord

Game Features

Off-Kilter Sunny Horror - On the outside, Midwintär takes place among sunny, medieval villages populated by friendly inhabitants. Stay overnight, though, and you might be horrified to reveal the true nature of their sacred rituals.

Sun / Moon Gameplay Cycle - Midwintär features a 3-minute day-night cycle that changes your abilities. You must use your day-time skills such as lock-picking or spreading rumours among villagers to best prepare the terrain for the night-time havoc when you transform into a bloodthirsty, overpowered monster.

Gossip Mechanics - Each villager in Midwintär has their own suspicion-meter you can influence by gossiping and spreading rumors about other villagers, and there is also a panic-meter that changes the AI behaviour of all villagers on the map.

Three Playable Characters - You will be able to choose, play and switch between three playable characters - a werewolf, a vampire and a moon witch - each of whom possess a distinctive skillset and boast a different playstyle.

Co-Op Multiplayer - Midwintär will feature a split screen and a local multiplayer for up to three players, enabling all three characters to fight together.
